TextView.android:text: Signal Generator Detector Wave Form\n\n(Time Base 5µs/div.:15V logic level)
Decoding window\nSelect efficiency % on the test facility and record the measured efficiency % for interrogation spacing
Reply rate \n(From the test interrogator Select reply rate on the test facility)
Operate the switch on the receiver/ video module to the INHIBIT INTERROGATION Portion. Measure the squitter rate
Operate the switch to the reply rate monitor portion and record the reply rate
Press the MAX REPLY RATE on test facility and record the reading
Connect the oscilloscope probe to DETECTED LOG VIDEO jack and press MAXIMUM REPLY RATE\n(Interrogation Gaussian pulse of 3.0 V reduce to 0.5 ± .25 V Amplitude)
Measure & Record the duration of pulse at the dead time test jack
Transmitted pulse shape(after near linear detection)\n(Gaussian pulse pair Pulse width 3.5µs)
Connect 10dB attenuator toward A part on the directional coupler and HP detector with the RF Panel behind control panel
SELECT delay test On the test facility and check the characteristics of the pulse present at the REPLY ACCEPT GATES test jack
6. Tx PULSE SHAPE, POWER OUTPUT & SPECTRUM
1st pulse duration at half amplitude\n(Between 3 to 4 µs)
2nd pulse duration at half amplitude\n(Between 3 to 4 µs)
1st pulse rise time 10% to 90% \nBetween 1.8 to 2.5 µs (Between 1.5 to 3 µs)
2nd pulse rise time 10% to 90% \nBetween 1.8 to 2.5 µs (Between 1.5 to 3 µs)
1st pulse fall time 90% to 10% \nBetween 1.8 to 2.5 µs (Between 1.5 to 3 µs)
2nd pulse fall time 90% to 10% \nBetween 1.8 to 2.5 µs (Between 1.5 to 3 µs)
Pulse separation between half amplitude points on leading edge of each pulse
Adjust LDES threshold to 0.2V with R4 at test point X3 it has to be less than peak interrogation pulse at X2.Measure new Dead time
Select the efficiency at -84dBm. Dead time will be
1350 PPS message repeats 30sec Listens for Aural ident
Check all cables & connectors to & from aerial
Power System low voltage trip (Ref 3-5.13.1 of vol.)\nTested O.K
Equipment Operation on batteries for 10 minutes Approx.
